sentences.english: Eg: Gambling brings him to ruin.
The robberies have chilled the mah-jongg network.
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案已经使麻将赌博网络胆战心惊。

sentences.english: Gambling revenues jumped 59% compared to the previous November.
sentences.chinese: 赌博业收入与去年同期相比激增了59%。

sentences.english: He contended that gambling was the worst of all evils.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持认为赌博为万恶之首。

sentences.english: The quine[11] won by Europe, paid by France.
sentences.chinese: 是一场欧洲赢了法国输了的赌博。

sentences.english: And one-armed bandit is the commodity that national explicit order prohibits selling.
sentences.chinese: 而赌博机是国家明令禁止销售的商品。

sentences.english: He got quite cleaned out by gambling.
sentences.chinese: 因赌博他囊空如洗，身无分文。

sentences.english: Millions of middle-class Chinese have gambled on buying new apartments.
sentences.chinese: 数百万的中国中产阶级买房就像赌博。

sentences.english: Laibin city police in Guangxi broke up a gambling ring running a racket called "mark-six lottery".
sentences.chinese: 来宾市警方粉碎了一个六合彩赌博集团。

sentences.english: It was gambling time for rain-dependent farmers across India.
sentences.chinese: 对于印度这些靠天吃饭的农民，这更像是一场赌博。

sentences.english: Remember that traffic safety to gamble with life.
sentences.chinese: 交通安全要记住，莫用生命来赌博。

sentences.english: Jack blew all his money gambling in Macao .
sentences.chinese: 杰克把他的钱全花在澳门的赌博上。

sentences.english: A large amount of money was squandered by him on gambling.
sentences.chinese: 在过去一段时间，他把大量的金钱挥霍在了赌博上。
是谁的形象把赌博神圣化了？

sentences.english: A player on the sports team blew the whistle on the gambling scandal.
sentences.chinese: 体育队的选手检举赌博弊案的秘辛。

sentences.english: Lottery is also a form of gambling.
sentences.chinese: 彩票也是赌博的一种形式。
